job_description: DescriptionBit Stew Systems is currently seeking a co-op software engineer to join our team in Vancouver, BC. This exciting role will join our growing engineering team in the area of development and quality assurance.Desired Skills & Experience• Preferred 3rd or 4th year student• At least 1 Co-op work-terms.• Understand software development life cycle using agile development methodology.• Working knowledge of Linux and Windows environments.• Working knowledge of shell scripting. Bash, batch and/or PowerShell scripting.• Knowledge of build tools such as ANT and GRADLE.• Knowledge in Java, XML, Tomcat, SQL, and web services.• Knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery and XPath• Fluent in spoken and written English
job_requirements: Responsibility• Develop and maintain build scripts.• Develop and maintain packaging scripts• Develop and maintain deployment scripts• Troubleshoot configurations issues• Perform manual, exploratory and smoke test.• Document testing result.• Document defect triage result. This includes creating report with instructions to reproduce defect.• Setup and test automated build tools.• Setup and test automated testing tools.• Setup and test automated packaging tools.Open To All Majors:No
